message: Replaced all remaining legacy Modbus usage with dual-address model; RealPLC now selects coil vs holding solely from data_type and requires read/write addresses; listener resolves parameter by name and writes via PLC manager; docs updated.

key_changes: Enforced presence of read_modbus_address/write_modbus_address with clear error logs
Valves/purge now use write_modbus_address with binary data_type -> coils
Listener looks up parameter by name from component_parameters_full and prefers write_parameter
Docs reflect removal of legacy columns and types
